description:
The VC-27 Tunny is a powerful medium transport craft with vertical take-off and landing capability. The proven design of General Titanic`s workhorse transport aircraft is such that the plane can be found in service in almost all the branches of the U.N. Forces, from the U.N. Spacy to the U.N. Navy.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/tunny.htm
name: VC-27 Tunny
